description: Students gain experience in computer-industry positions. Recent projects have included contributions to team programming, documentation, business applications of computing, modifications of large proprietary code bases using industry-standard software frameworks, test-driven development, creating mobile-computing interfaces for existing software systems, and improving security of company websites. Internship experiences (whether for credit or not) are strongly encouraged for anyone considering a career in computing.
name: Academic Internship

revisions.description: Students gain experience in computer-industry positions. Projects have included contributions toteam programming, implementation of solid modeling (NURBS), documentation, business applications of computing, and applications of computer graphics in medical research. Internshipexperiences (whether for credit or not) are strongly encouraged for anyone considering acareer in computing.
